name: BAGEL QDP
body:
Uses the Bagel package of Peter Boyle to produce optimized linear algebra (BLAS-like) routines for use in other packages like [QDP/C++](http://usqcd-software.github.io/c-lime/).

The motivation for this development comes from the U.S. Dept. of Energy SciDAC program. See the [USQCD](http://www.usqcd.org) home pages for more details.

Source code:

The latest releases of BAGEL_QDP and SciDAC software can be found on the the [USQCD Software page](http://usqcd-software.github.io).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
